summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Glass Factory ERP Phase 1 - QR Codes and Print functionality. All 13 backend QR code API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing verified QR modal with QR code and barcode images, Print Report buttons on Production, Admin, and Accounts dashboards, and Print Job Card functionality.

minor.issue: QR code APIs are accessible without authentication (may be intentional for QR scanning purposes)

issues: Console warnings about chart dimensions (-1 width/height) - charts still render correctly but may need CSS fix

critical_code_review_comments: QR code generation uses teal color (#0d9488) as specified
QR codes are properly rendered as base64 data URLs in the frontend
Print functionality uses window.open() to create print-ready HTML pages with proper styling
All print buttons have proper data-testid attributes for testing
seed_data_creation: Using existing production orders and invoices from previous iterations

QR Code API - /api/erp/qr/job-card/{job_.details: Returns PNG image of QR code with teal color styling

Barcode API - /api/erp/qr/job-card/{job_.details: Returns PNG image of Code128 barcode

Print Data API - /api/erp/qr/job-card/{j.details: Returns job card details with base64 QR code and barcode images

Invoice QR API - /api/erp/qr/invoice/{in.details: Returns PNG image of QR code for invoice

Production Dashboard - Print Report Butt.details: Button visible with data-testid='print-all-orders-btn', opens print window with formatted report

Production Dashboard - QR Button on Job.details: 5 QR buttons found, each with data-testid='qr-btn-{job_card_number}'

Production Dashboard - QR Modal.details: Modal opens with job card details, QR code image (base64), barcode image (base64), Print Job Card button, Download QR button

Production Dashboard - Print Job Card Bu.details: Button visible in QR modal with data-testid='print-job-card-btn'

Admin Dashboard - Print Report Button.details: Button visible with data-testid='print-admin-dashboard-btn', text: 'Print Report'

Accounts Dashboard - Invoices Tab Print.details: Button visible with data-testid='print-invoices-btn', text: 'Print List'

context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 QR Codes and Print functionality is fully implemented and working. QR code APIs generate styled QR codes with teal color (#0d9488). Print functionality uses window.open() to create print-ready HTML pages. All dashboards (Production, Admin, Accounts) have Print Report buttons. QR modal shows QR code and barcode images as base64 data URLs. Previous iterations tested CRM, Production, HR, Inventory, Purchase, Accounts, Admin Dashboard, and Payouts modules. Login credentials: admin@lucumaa.in / adminpass.
